title: Idol Kyousei Sousa
synopsis:
A devil's smartphone that can manipulate a woman's body at will just by taking a picture. Just touch the screen to stimulate any body part! The movements and sensitivity of the body are all at the operators’ fingertips ...!

You cannot fight against the power of the "devil's smartphone" and will give in to the pleasure! This time, the target of "Devil's Smartphone": ...The idol Yua Hibino!

(Source: TMDB)
